name: Nikhil Sangwan
about: Hi there!!! Let me start with things i like most, i.e sketching, gaming and last but not the least web designing. I do sketching since my childhood and mainly draw anime and cartoon based sketches. I start gaming in collage and a big fan of counter strike 1.6 and counter strike GO, also participated in several events and secure 1st rank in JSS collage. I love web designing as much as i love my other hobbies. I love to design user interface and aminly work with Angularjs. I am highly motiveted about my career as web developer.

instarefr.com.details: During the intern, i play the role of front-end developer and design few pages. Frameworks i used were Twitter Bootstrap and AngularJs. Back-end was written in PHP and project was build in PHP framework itself named codeigniter 3.0

Nethues Technologies.details: It was my summer intern and i learn a lots of thing regarding web developing, languages and thier compatibility. I design given snippets using polymer 1.0, plain HTML , CSS and AngularJs.

fundsofhope.org.aboutProject: fundsofhope.org is my major project and did the UI task. Design cards, toolbar and other snippets. Work with Angular Material and Angular 1.

letsshopit.aboutProject: It was my 3rd semester project. I developed a mini shopping website using Bootstrap, HTML, CSS, JavaScript and mySql.
